recipe.title: How to Make Churros
recipe.intro: Churros are fried dough sticks coated in cinnamon sugar. They are crispy on the outside and soft inside. Serve them with chocolate sauce for dipping!
recipe.ingredients: water, butter, sugar, salt, plain flour, eggs, cinnamon, caster sugar, oil for frying, dark chocolate, cream
steps: **Boil** the water, butter, sugar, and salt in a pot over medium heat.
**Remove** the pot from the heat and **add** the flour all at once. **Stir** hard until the dough forms a ball.
**Add** the eggs one at a time and **mix** well after each one.
**Put** the dough into a piping bag with a star tip.
**Heat** the oil to 180 degrees. **Pipe** the dough into the oil and **fry** for 3 to 4 minutes until golden.
**Roll** the hot churros in cinnamon sugar. **Melt** the chocolate with cream to make a dipping sauce. **Serve** warm!

quiz1.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"Fry for 3 to 4 minutes until golden."

review.text: I found Prawn Star Dessert Bar near the wharf. They have a special churros menu. I ordered the churros with chocolate and caramel dipping sauces. The churros were very fresh and crispy. The cinnamon sugar was just right. My boyfriend had churros with ice cream. He loved it. The view of the marina was beautiful. A fun place for dessert after dinner!

quiz2.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"My boyfriend had churros with ice cream."

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Good evening! Welcome to our cafÃ©. Here is the menu.

lines.speaker: Jack
lines.text: Thanks! Mia, do you want to share some churros?

lines.speaker: Mia
lines.text: Yes! Can we get the churros for two, please?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Great choice! You can choose two dipping sauces. We have chocolate, caramel, and strawberry.

lines.speaker: Mia
lines.text: I want chocolate. Jack, what about you?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Chocolate and caramel. Got it! Any drinks?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Would you like marshmallows on top?

lines.speaker: Mia
lines.text: Oh yes, please! That sounds amazing.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Perfect! That will be twenty-two dollars. Your churros will be ready in five minutes.

part_a.full_text: Excuse me, how much are the churros? They are five dollars for six pieces. Can I add chocolate sauce? Yes, the sauce is one dollar extra. OK, I will take six churros with chocolate sauce. Here you go. Be careful, they are very hot! Thank you! They smell so good. Enjoy your churros!

gaps.before: They are five dollars for six

part_b.full_text: Are you a fan of churros? Come and join our weekend cooking class at Tropical Kitchen Studio. This Saturday from ten in the morning to twelve thirty, you will learn how to make churros from scratch. Chef Maria will teach you step by step. You will also learn how to make three different sauces: chocolate, salted caramel, and berry. The class is forty-five dollars per person and includes all ingredients. You can take home the churros you make. Please book online before Thursday. Spaces are limited to twelve people.

try_it.example: Yesterday I ate churros at a night market. They were crispy and sweet. I dipped them in chocolate sauce. It was the best dessert!
